A minimalist, unconfigurable static site generator built with Deno, for Deno.
→ Start fast...
ssgo init && ssgo dev
→ With a simple project structure...
├── creators/ <- the scripts creating your pages
├── templates/ <- the templates of your pages
├── components/ <- your components
└── static/ <- your static files
→ With TS support out of the box,
→ Simple components system,
→ File watching...
Read the docs
